strings.Value: "Sometimes the carelessness of this party is cause for great concern. No one even tried to hide the camp!"
"I once served the Swordlords. I must admit, their people would never leave their camps out in the open like this!"
"You're right, it is unwise. But perhaps this is the will of Sarenrae, and the light of our fire shall lead some poor soul to salvation..."
"Screw it! I laugh in danger's face. Let 'em come â€” I'll knock their teeth in!"

"Alright, I'll play scribe. We'll lodge your formal complaint properly, and pass it on to the {mf|baron|baroness|king|queen}'s chancery. We do have a chancery in the {mf|barony|barony|kingdom|kingdom}, don't we?"
"Ha. Give those war dogs free rein, and they'll give us military order every waking moment. You'll have us doing drills on the training ground!"
"Bravery and carelessness are two sides of the same coin. Maybe our leader thinks we can handle whatever comes our way!"
"Bravery and carelessness are two sides of the same coin. Maybe our leader thinks we can handle whatever comes our way!"
